column4: hey i have a wine program that needs to acces the internet and i don't know how to configure my firewall, what is the ubuntu firewall called?
ubuntu doesnt hve a firewall unless u install it
well whatever is blocking this program form reaching the internet, it would be nice to know how to fix it
sorry but i rally don't know that much about wine.... it oculd be your wineconfig but i really dont know
